content: materials - 1 skein of blue sky s worsted hand dyes 50% superfine alpaca and 50% merino wool each skein is 100 yards/ 100 grams approximately 100 yards required we used charcoal - a us 8 5 mm 16-inch circular needle 1 - a set of us 8 double pointed needles 2 gauge 18 stitches = 4 inches in stockinette stitch size 18⅔ inches in circumference to fit most women and some men **don t forget to check out the other version - the big rib thank you hat 3 ** 1 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23799 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/thank-you-hat---big-rib-hat
